description.en:
1-3: Love Seminar  
Shigeta Maki is stuck with the hardest lesson of his life. He is madly in love and the object of his affection, Professor Onodera, is so far out of reach, he has no idea what to do. Lucky for him, there's someone to show him the way: Yoshioka, sex expert and delinquent tenant of the apartment complex Maki lives in and helps run. Will love lessons help Maki snag his unrequited love? Or will he find a new goal to shoot for?  
  
4: Koishitara Mermaid  
When school and family pressure becomes too much for Hirose Misaki, he jumps off a cliff! He's rescued by an eccentric fisherman, Kaidou Youichi, and before he knows it, Misaki is stranded in the middle of the ocean with a crazy man who thinks he's a mermaid!  
  
5: Mr. Bear Of The Forest  
Six months ago, Jou got lost on a mountain and was rescued by Ooguma-san, an unfriendly woodsman who lives there. So why is Jou back for a visit?
description.pl:
Ch04: Misaki ma dość bycia porównywanym do  
starszych braci, którzy w oczach jego matki są idealni.  
Któreś dnia po kłótni z rodzicielką, rzuca się z klifu do morza.  
I niechybnie by utonął, gdyby nie zastał złowiony w rybacką sieć…  
Przez przystojnego, bogatego dyrektora dużej firmy, należałoby dodać.
